alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and east central Clay Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 9 miles north of Hastings, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bostwick, Picolata and Federal Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
